name: mRelief
headline: mRelief has built an easy-to-use platform and web and text messagingâ¦
description: mRelief is a nonprofit that provides an easy-to-use platform on the web and text messaging -- at 74544 -- for Americans to sign up for SNAP. Built on public datasets provided by the USDA on BBCE and COVID-19 Waivers, they help people find out if they might be likely eligible for SNAP in all 50 states and DC.

# What could you do with an extra $170?*
We’re mRelief – the nonprofit that helps you sign up for Food Stamps. Find out how much you could save by seeing if you qualify right now.
What's your zip code?
Get Started
You can also text "Food" to 74544 to complete our screener over text message.**
*This represents the average SNAP benefit amount according to [FNS](https://www.mrelief.com/<https:/www.fns.usda.gov/tfp/blog-083021>).
**Message and data rates may apply. See [Terms & Conditions](https://www.mrelief.com/</terms>).
![](https://www.mrelief.com/assets/phone-e61e092c06e6dbc6fe0d14028656375196117d061f545210dd309cac0dab1cb8.png)
## Hi, we're mRelief—a nonprofit that helps you sign up for food stamps.
STEP 1
### Find out if you likely qualify for SNAP.
We designed our eligibility screener to make it easy to find out if you likely qualify for SNAP (food stamps). You can take our screener online or by text. Just text “Food” to 74544 to get started.*
*Message and data rates may apply. See [Terms & Conditions.](https://www.mrelief.com/</terms>)
STEP 2
### We will direct you to the best way to apply.
If you’re likely eligible for SNAP, we show you the best way to apply. In some states, we offer a simplified application and the option to apply with assistance over the phone with a trusted community partner.
## We’re on a mission to transform social services for the inherent dignity of all people.
#textsfromourusers
  * I was lost in the process and they helped me so much! I probably would have gave up without their help. Thank you.
- mRelief user, Kentucky
  * Being homebound and alone, and in these Covid times afraid of in-person contact with people; and not smartphone or computer literate your warm, compassionate telephone help is a blessing. Thank you.
- mRelief user, Florida
  * Help was readily available and took care of every question I had. I even heard from DHS within the hour.
- mRelief user, Illinois


## We're working to fill pantries and fridges across America.
[Learn more](https://www.mrelief.com/</community>)
![](https://www.mrelief.com/assets/home/new_fridge-4675cf8c15e15d17bc9200b3976b784dbba43e459f83f70d900ef0ae7d2b77af.png)
## #impactSNAPshot
Households Served
### mRelief has served 4,475,175 individuals.
Benefits Unlocked
### mRelief has unlocked $1,753,326,420 in SNAP benefits.
#### Want to learn more?
[About Us](https://www.mrelief.com/<about_us>)

generated_description:
mRelief is a nonprofit organization founded in 2014 and based in Chicago, Illinois. It emerged from the need to make signing up for the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP)—commonly known as food stamps—easier for Americans. This mission is particularly critical as many individuals and families navigated the challenges posed by the COVID-19 pandemic.

The organization’s platform is designed to be user-friendly, available both online and via text messaging at 74544. It utilizes public datasets from the USDA to help individuals determine if they may be eligible for SNAP benefits across all 50 states and the District of Columbia. By simplifying what can often be a confusing process, mRelief aims to empower users to access vital food resources.

mRelief is not just about helping individuals fill out forms; it goes further by directing potential SNAP recipients to the best application routes, which often include simplified applications or assistance through community partners. The impact of their work has been profound, with over 4.4 million individuals served and more than $1.75 billion in benefits unlocked for those in need.

With a modest team of 12 people, mRelief is a part of Y Combinator's Winter 2016 batch, which highlights its innovative approach to social services. Their message is clear: they are on a mission to restore dignity by transforming social support systems and making them more accessible to everyone.

If you're curious to see if you qualify for SNAP benefits, you can start by visiting their website at [mRelief.com](https://www.mrelief.com) or simply text "Food" to 74544 to engage with their eligibility screener directly via message. They've seamlessly blended technology with compassionate support to fill the pantries and fridges of countless households across the nation. It’s a modern solution to an age-old problem, and it’s making a real difference.
